--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

FACES x Saudi National Day with Saud Abdulhamid

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/d2384971b8a851571acc22ba6bf8196b1849919381.gif> 	

Representing the bold, modern spirit of Saudi Arabia, he is the only Saudi football player to make it on the global map, representing a new generation of confidence, talent and national pride. Embodying the bright future and evolution of the nation, it is Saud’s rituals that have led him to his success. Get ready to experience the Saudi spirit across FACES stores and online this September! 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

Zimmermann opens in Kuwait and Abu Dhabi

chunks.text:
Representing the bold, modern spirit of Saudi Arabia, he is the only Saudi football player to make it on the global map, representing a new generation of confidence, talent and national pride. Embodying the bright future and evolution of the nation, it is Saud’s rituals that have led him to his success. Get ready to experience the Saudi spirit across FACES stores and online this September! 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

Zimmermann opens in Kuwait and Abu Dhabi

ZIMMERMANN is pleased to announce the opening of its newest boutiques in Abu Dhabi, situated in the prestigious Galleria Mall on Al Maryah Island and in Kuwait, located in the prestigious Avenues Mall — one of Kuwait’s most celebrated luxury retail destinations. Designed by long-term collaborators, Studio McQualter, the boutiques offer a seamless retail experience for clients to engage with seasonal collections. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/f5806b986ded116f2b4bd5f2a872e00e235621799.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-2-min.png> 	
Internal Mobility Spotlight: Margherita Belloni 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1932&user=10620>

<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/f5806b986ded116f2b4bd5f2a872e00e235621799.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-2-min.png> 	
Internal Mobility Spotlight: Margherita Belloni 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1932&user=10620> 	

Effective 10 September, Margherita Belloni will be taking on a new scope as Senior People Partner, reporting to Samer Touma, VP- People. In this role, Margherita will play a key role in shaping and delivering the people strategy, driving organizational effectiveness, supporting leadership and individual development, and enhancing employee experience across the People & Culture Vertical, Transform Chalhoub Vertical, and Group Management, which include Group Communication, Internal Audit, PMO, Sustainability, and the Family Office. Read More <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1932&user=10620> 


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-4-min.png> 	

Swarovski now in Nakheel Mall, Dubai

Effective 10 September, Margherita Belloni will be taking on a new scope as Senior People Partner, reporting to Samer Touma, VP- People. In this role, Margherita will play a key role in shaping and delivering the people strategy, driving organizational effectiveness, supporting leadership and individual development, and enhancing employee experience across the People & Culture Vertical, Transform Chalhoub Vertical, and Group Management, which include Group Communication, Internal Audit, PMO, Sustainability, and the Family Office. Read More <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1932&user=10620> 


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-4-min.png> 	

Swarovski now in Nakheel Mall, Dubai

Explore the new Swarovski store in Nakheel Mall, Dubai to discover our new interior and be taken with our collection of exquisitely crafted crystals, fusing timeless elegance with a bold contemporary edge. 
"The era of joyful glamour has arrived, we just need you!"
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1933&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-7-min.png> 	
shop the max mara sale 
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/68b808f6101c71665189853.jpeg> 	

Don’t miss out — our Max Mara staff discount of an additional 30% still applies on all sale items!

With the sale now up to 65% off, it’s the perfect time to get ready for back-to-work shopping.

Happy shopping!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/06-1-min.png>
